weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds
☔ You need an umbrella when I'm around
🌧️ Puddles form when I fall

weather.question: I am big and yellow and give you warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I am in the sky during the day
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm very bright
🌻 Plants need me to grow

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep sometimes
✈️ Airplanes fly through me
☁️ I can bring rain or sunshine

weather.question: I make the leaves dance and the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong
🪁 You can fly a kite with me
💨 I am air moving quickly

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🧤 You can make snowballs with me
❄️ I am made of frozen water
⛄ People build snowmen with me

weather.question: I am rain that freezes as it falls. I'm like tiny ice balls bouncing around. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen rain
🤕 Sometimes, I can hurt if I hit you
⚾ I am small and round, like a ball

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come before the thunder
⛈️ I am part of a thunderstorm
🔦 I am very bright and fast

weather.question: I am the loud rumbling sound after a flash of light in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I follow the lightning
🔊 I am a loud booming noise
👂 You can hear me during a storm

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors
💧 I appear when the sun shines through the rain
🍀 Some people say there is a pot of gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin in a circle. I form over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am very strong and dangerous
🌊 I can cause floods
🏠 People often need to evacuate when I come near

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am a fruit
🌳 I grow on trees
🥣 I am good in smoothies

food.question: I am round and red, and sometimes green. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on a tree.
👩‍⚕️ Doctors tell you to eat me
🍎 Snow White liked me.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me.
👀 I am good for your eyes.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with your cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐮 Cows give me.
🦴 I make your bones strong.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that can be red, green, or purple. Birds love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🥤 You can make juice from me.
🍷 Some grown-ups make wine from me.

food.question: I am a food you can spread on bread. Bees make me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I am sweet.
🐝 Bees make me in a hive.
🐻 Winnie the Pooh likes me very much.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green.
🌳 I look like a little tree.
💪 I am good for you.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. You bake me in the oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make sandwiches with me.
🔥 You need to bake me in the oven.
🌾 I'm often made from wheat.

food.question: I am a cold treat that comes in many flavors. I am often eaten in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am very cold.
👅 You lick me.
🌞 People like to eat me on a hot day.

food.question: I am a vegetable with many layers. You cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow under the ground.
😭 Cutting me can make you cry.
🍔 I can be put on a burger
